value.title: Save the bees, save the world: How ApisProtect uses AI and IoT to protect hives
value.excerpt: Not be an alarmist, but if bees go extinct it’s likely that coffee would become a rare and expensive luxury commodity. And I don’t want to live in that world. Luckily, ApisProtect today announced its entry into the US market where it will provide its unique AI-powered hive monitoring system to beekeepers and farmers.

value.title: Smarter Cars: Auto Makers Experiment With Chips That Think Like Humans
value.excerpt: Experimental computer chips that try to mimic the way human brains work could accelerate the use of voice and gesture commands in cars, researchers say.

value.title: Thundercomm launches unparalleled edge computing product TurboX EB5 Edge AI Box
value.excerpt: PRNewswire/ -- Thundercomm, a world-leading IoT product and solution provider, unleashed a new era of edge computing with the launch of TurboX  EB5 Edge AI Box. Featuring outstanding capabilities in AI computing and video decoding,

value.title: AWS and NVIDIA achieve the fastest training times for Mask R-CNN and T5-3B
value.excerpt: Note: At the AWS re:Invent Machine Learning Keynote we announced performance records for T5-3B and Mask-RCNN. This blog post includes updated numbers with additional optimizations since the keynote aired live on 12/8. At re:Invent 2019, we demonstrated the fastest training times on the cloud for Mask

value.title: Adobe Is Making PDF Documents More Accessible To Screen Readers With New AI-Powered ‘Liquid Mode’
value.excerpt: Adobe on Thursday published a blog post in which the company explains how they made reading PDFs on mobile devices have been made more accessible to screen readers such as Apple’s VoiceOver with a new technology they call Liquid Mode.

value.title: The new laws of robotics — building on Asimov's science fiction legacy in the age of AI
value.excerpt: Way back in 1942, science fiction writer Isaac Asimov created the Three Laws of Robotics. Now, an AI expert has expanded that list in a bid to ensure the robotics revolution works for humans, not against them.

value.title: How AI and machine learning moved forward in 2020
value.excerpt: AI and machine learning saw several steps forward in 2020, from the first beta of GPT-3, stricter regulation of AI technologies and conversations around bias.

value.title: Salesforce claims its AI can spot signs of breast cancer with 92% accuracy
value.excerpt: Salesforce says it developed an AI system -- ReceptorNet -- that can spot signs of breast cancer with 92% accuracy.

value.title: U.K. Invests £250 Million To Lead The World In Healthcare AI
value.excerpt: NHSX, the organisation driving the digital transformation of health and social care, announced that 42 tech companies will receive a share of over £50 million in phase one of its £140m AI in Health and Care Award.

value.title: Turing nabs $32M more for an AI-based platform to source and manage engineers remotely

value.title: Cleo, the AI-powered ‘financial assistant’, raises $44M Series B led by EQT Ventures
value.excerpt: Cleo, the London founded “financial assistant” that takes the form of an app and chatbot and now counts the U.S. as its largest market, has raised $44 million in Series B funding. Leading the round, which I understand actually closed earlier this year,

value.title: Sensorium and Mubert develop AI-driven DJs for virtual reality concerts
value.excerpt: Sensorium has teamed up with Mubert to develop AI-driven DJs that can make AI-created music at virtual concerts in virtual reality.

value.title: Boast.ai raises $23M to help businesses get their R&D tax credits

value.title: ITRI Exhibits Innovations in AI, Robotics and e-Health at CES 2021
value.excerpt: Taiwan's largest and one of the world's leading high-tech applied research institutions, invites you to its event site (  ) for CES 2021 to view its innovations in artificial intelligence (AI), robotics and e-health.

value.title: How to get face recognition on HomeKit security cameras in iOS 14 and macOS Big Sur
value.excerpt: Once you know how it's meant to work, it's very easy to have your HomeKit security cameras recognize you and your family. It can just be a little frustrating when you first try to use it.

value.title: FPGA chips are coming on fast in the race to accelerate AI
value.excerpt: Technology innovations Innovations like high-speed tensor logic blocks and lightning-fast transceivers speed AI performance and development.

value.title: $74.5 Billion Automotive Artificial Intelligence Markets: Machine Learning & Deep Learning, Computer Vision, Natural Language Processing - Global Oppo
value.excerpt: The Global Automotive AI Market was valued at USD 2.49 billion in 2019, and is estimated to garner USD 74.5 billion by 2030, at a CAGR of 36.2% during the forecast period, from 2020 to 2030. Artificial Intelligence (AI) is one of the most advancing technologies in computer science.

value.title: Unbiased AI becomes mission-critical in 2021
value.excerpt: While data management becomes critical, recognizing how data annotators influence model bias will be paramount to success.

value.title: UK AI start-up Papercup raises £8m in funding
value.excerpt: UK artificial intelligence start-up Papercup, has managed to raise £8m in funding for its speech tech platform that translates people’s voices into other languages.

value.title: TD Sees Big Role for AI in Fraud Detection, Lending Decisions
value.excerpt: The biggest contributions artificial intelligence can make to financial institutions are ones customers may never see, said Toronto-Dominion Bank’s Tomi Poutanen.

value.title: 1 Fintech Stock to Buy Before 2021
value.excerpt: However, the peculiar nature of the pandemic has actually been something of a boon to disruptive fintech stocks. Because people have had to stay home, retailers and banks have had to reach their customers digitally.

value.title: Ava expands its AI captioning to desktop and web apps, and raises $4.5M to scale
value.excerpt: The worldwide shift to virtual workplaces has been a blessing and a curse to people with hearing impairments. Having office chatter occur in text rather than speech is more accessible, but virtual meetings are no easier to follow than in-person ones — which is why real-time captioning startup Ava

value.title: Nearly half of IT leaders fear AI will replace them by 2030
value.excerpt: Two-fifths of IT leaders (41%) believe that artificial intelligence (AI) will make them redundant within the next 10 years. Trend Micro research found that only 9% of respondents were confident AI wouldn’t replace their job within the next decade,

value.title: An eye for an AI: Optic device mimics human retina
value.excerpt: If our artificial intelligence is able to think like a human brain, why do we feed it data like a normal computer? Scientists are addressing this question by considering the sensory input we human receive and have developed an optical device inspired by the working of the human eye.
